title: opinion
description: An Opinion is an assessment of the correctness of the information in a STIX Object produced by a different entity and captures the level of agreement or disagreement using a fixed scale.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `opinion`.

explanation.description: An explanation of why the producer has this Opinion.

authors.description: The name of the author(s) of this opinion (e.g., the analyst(s) that created it).

object_refs.description: The STIX Objects (SDOs and SROs) that the opinion is being applied to.

opinion.description: The opinion that the producer has about about all of the STIX Object(s) listed in the object_refs property.
